localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
Good one from @verdadcap today on bubbles

Ray Dalio & Peter Lynch began warning investors about a bubble in 1995

Then this happened in the S&P 500:

1996 +23%
1997 +33%
1998 +28%
1999 +21%

https://t.co/I3ov4m0z0k https://t.co/J9gUQ0nc1g
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
今天，@verdadcap的一篇关于泡泡的文章写得不错。

雷-达利欧&彼得-林奇在1995年开始警告投资者有泡沫。

然后这种情况发生在S&P 500中。

1996 +23%
1997 +33%
1998 +28%
1999 +21%

https://t.co/I3ov4m0z0k

今天，@verdadcap的一篇關於泡泡的文章寫得不錯。

雷-達利歐&彼得-林奇在1995年開始警告投資者有泡沫。

然後這種情況發生在S&P 500中。

1996 +23%
1997 +33%
1998 +28%
1999 +21%

https://t.co/I3ov4m0z0k

next.excerpt: Agree is a shared voting app to help you come to a joint decision with friends and colleagues. Create and share polls, and simply swipe right to vote yes and left for no. Winning options pop up as a notification once everyone has voted.
next.title: Agree - Polls with friends

localize.description: Agree是一款共享投票应用，帮助你与朋友和同事达成共同的决定。创建和分享投票，只需向右滑动投赞成票，向左滑动投反对票。一旦大家都投了票，获胜的选项就会以通知的形式弹出。
Agree是一款共享投票應用，幫助你與朋友和同事達成共同的決定。創建和分享投票，只需向右滑動投贊成票，向左滑動投反對票。一旦大家都投了票，獲勝的選項就會以通知的形式彈出。
